name: Skating Anna
description:
The game :

Anna is a giraffe who can grow or lower their neck. Also, they can skate.
Help them catching as many pineapples as you can ! But be careful, birds and holes might be things you want to avoid...

  

Controls : 

- Change neck size : up or down arrow, Z/S (azerty), A/S (qwerty)
- Jump : Enter or Space key.

Original soundtrack :

You can get the original soundtrack for free here :

Credits :

- Grizzly Cogs : Art, dev, music, sfx.
Made for Video Games Labs : Game Jam 2021.
